message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a limited time at $200. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  While I can't go as low as $120, I'm willing to come down to $180. I believe that's a fair compromise.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $150. Can you meet me at that price?
